content: so here's the paper again https://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~caw77/papers/mechanising-and-verifying-the-webassembly-specification.pdf and I get the gist of it now but I want the Isabelle model and I can't find it anywhere. honestly I'm not really good with reading academic papers so I wouldn't be surprised if the model was somewhere really obvious
